channel.title: [pi] Higher kill streak = More pk points per kill [pi]
channel.description:
How do i make it where when your on a streak you get more pk points per kill
1kill streak 1 point 2kill streak 1 point 3kill streak 2 points 4kill streak 2 points 5kill streak 3 points 6kill streak 3 points 7kill streak 4 points 8kill streak 4 points 9kill streak 5 points 10kill streak 5points 11kill+ 5 points
And if you die or log your streak resets
secondly how do i attach clan tags to yell for how many pk kills you got like if you got 1k kills and when you ::yell it will say [god of pking]Username:Message here

item.title: [pi] Higher kill streak = More pk points per kill [pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

I got it but once you get the second rank it yells twice the first rank and second rank so if you get to the last rank. It will spamm all ranks my code is below

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
        if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
            Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
            String tag = "";
            String message = Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5));
            if (c.pkKills >= 0) {
                tag = "[Beginner]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 10) {
                tag = "[Grunt]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 20) {
                tag = "[Private]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 30) {
                tag = "[Private R2]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 40) {
                tag = "[Leading Private]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 50) {
                tag = "[Officer]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 100) {
                tag = "[Captain]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 200) {
                tag = "[Grand Captain]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 300) {
                tag = "[Grand Marshal]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 400) {
                tag = "[Grand Master]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 500) {
                tag = "[Pking Captain]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 600) {
                tag = "[Pking Marshal]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 700) {
                tag = "[Pking Grand Marshal]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 800) {
                tag = "[Pking Supreme Grand Marshal]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 900) {
                tag = "[Pking Jesus]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 1000) {
                tag = "[God of pking]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 3000) {
                tag = "[@red@God of Pking@bla@]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
            if (c.pkKills >= 5000) {
                tag = "[@dre@God of Pking@bla@]";
            c2.sendMessage(tag + " " + c.playerName + " - " + message);
	}
        }
    }
}

item.title: [pi] Higher kill streak = More pk points per kill [pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.playerRights <= 0 && c.memberStatus >= 1) {
				for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
						Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
						c2.sendMessage("[@whi@Member@bla@] " + c.playerName + ": @whi@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)));
					}
				}
			}

Um i forgot to make it for everyone so can you remove the member statius or w/e ty

item.title: [pi] Higher kill streak = More pk points per kill [pi]
item.dc:creator: @supernovarsps supernovarsps
item.description:
@supernovarsps wrote:

	public void applyDead() {	
		c.respawnTimer = 10;
		c.isDead = false;
		if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
			//c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
			c.killerId = findKiller();
			Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
			if(o != null) {
				if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
					o.sendMessage(""+c.playerName+" falls before your might.");
if(!PlayerKilling.hostOnList(o, c.connectedFrom)) {
	PlayerKilling.addHostToList(o, c.connectedFrom);
	o.pcPoints +=1;
	o.pkKills +=1;	
	o.getItems().addItem(995,500000);
	o.sendMessage("You now have [@red@"+o.pcPoints+"@bla@] PK Points kills! You also receive 500K coins.");
	o.sendMessage("You now have [@red@"+o.pkKills+"@bla@] PK kills!");
} else {
	o.sendMessage("You have recently defeated "+c.playerName+", so you don't receive any PK Points or Kills.");
}
				c.playerKilled = c.playerId;							c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
